title: How do I update my Talkband B1's firmware and app versions?
answer:
Your B1 supports OTA updates. To update your B1's firmwareand app, perform the following steps:  


1. Ensure that your B1 is connected to your phoneproperly over Bluetooth.  


2. Run **Huawei TalkBand** on your phone and choose **Settings**>**About**.  

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141120053543667001.png)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141120053551729001.png)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141120053556513001.png)  


3. Touch **Update TalkBand** to update your B1'sfirmware.  

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141120053623384001.png)  


4. Touch **Update TalkBand** app to update your Huawei TalkBand app.
